Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
GameBoard
public class GameBoard extends Object
Implements the functionality of the games's board

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBoard

      public GameBoard(String[][] tileEncodings, String floatingEncoding, int x, int y, int k)
      Constructor for the GameBoard class Within the constructor, the initial state of the board is initialized
      Parameters:
      tileEncodings - 2D-Array of Strings, representing the tile-encodings for the tiles of the board
      floatingEncoding - representation of the game's starting floating tile
      x - width of the board
      y - height of the board
      k - score to reach in order to win the game
      See Also:
      • Tile

      Parameters:
      rotateDir - direction of rotation
      See Also:
      • Tile.rotate(java.lang.String)

    • playerAtOrigin

      public boolean playerAtOrigin(int player)
      Determines if player is on his/her starting tile
      Parameters:
      player - the current player's position in the order in which the game is played
      Returns:
      true if player is currently on his/her starting tile
      See Also:
      • playerCurrentPos(java.lang.String)
